name: 勇者起源
description: 《Origin》is a 3D magic dark wind tower defense game. On the basis of the classic tower defense game, the game increases the confrontation between heroes and monsters. At the same time, the game also changes the way of resource acquisition and increases the competition for resources, which makes this game break the shackles of the traditional tower defense game. In addition, the game has also set up the playing method of card cultivation, a variety of powerful cards, which can be arranged and combined by you, greatly enhancing the strategic nature of the game. Exquisite 3D modeling makes the characters and scenes more real. The exquisite picture quality makes you feel different from the tower defense!
developers: JILIN JAI PANGU NETWORK SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY
publishers: JILIN JAI PANGU NETWORK SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY
